    • Method Detail

      • disposeImpl

        protected void disposeImpl()
        Description copied from class: TileReader
        Implementation specific disposal. Implementations should always invoke super.disposeImpl().

        The default implementation marks TileReader.valid as false.

        This method will always be externally synchronized on this.readLock.

        Overrides:
        disposeImpl in class TileReader

      • decodeTileBitmap

        protected android.graphics.Bitmap decodeTileBitmap​(CursorIface result)
        Decodes the tile bitmap.

        Note: This method is always externally synchronized on this.readLock.

        Parameters:
        result - The row data
        Returns:
        The decoded tile or null if the tile could not be decoded.

      • read

        public TileReader.ReadResult read​(long srcX,
                                  long srcY,
                                  long srcW,
                                  long srcH,
                                  int dstW,
                                  int dstH,
                                  byte[] buf)
        Description copied from class: TileReader
        Reads an arbitrary region of the image at an arbitrary scale. The source data will be scaled to meet dstW and dstH.
        Specified by:
        read in class TileReader
        Parameters:
        srcX - The source (unscaled) x-coordinate of the region
        srcY - The source (unscaled) y-coordinate of the region
        srcW - The source (unscaled) width of the region
        srcH - The source (unscaled) height of the region
        dstW - The output width
        dstH - The output size
        buf - Output buffer for the data of the specified tile
        Returns:
        true if the read completed successfuly, false if the operation was canceled asynchronously
        See Also:
        TileReader.read(int, long, long, byte[])

        Description copied from class: TileReader

      • generateTileUri

        public static java.lang.String generateTileUri​(java.io.File db,
                                               java.lang.String sql,
                                               int tileWidth,
                                               int tileHeight)
        Generates a URI that can be handled by a SQLiteTileReader with a scheme of sqlite.
        Parameters:
        db - The database file
        sql - The SQL select statement to retrieve the tile from the database; the tile blob MUST be in column 0.
        tileWidth - The width of the tile, in pixels
        tileHeight - The height of the tile, in pixels
        Returns:
        A URI that can be handled by a SQLiteTileReader.

      • generateTileUri

        public static java.lang.String generateTileUri​(java.lang.String customScheme,
                                               java.io.File db,
                                               java.lang.String sql,
                                               int width,
                                               int height)
        Generates a URI that can be handled by a SQLiteTileReader.
        Parameters:
        customScheme - The scheme for the URI
        db - The database file
        sql - The SQL select statement to retrieve the tile from the database; the tile blob MUST be in column 0.
        width - The width of the tile, in pixels
        height - The height of the tile, in pixels
        Returns:
        A URI that can be handled by a SQLiteTileReader.
